trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Greensburg
There was one other sighting in Greensburg on or around June 29th 2008
Summary: large extremely bright object moving toward NE
divs: sighting detailsi let the dogs out on sun 6\29 at 10:15 pm. movement in the sky caught my attention. i saw an extremely bright starlike object moving very fast (3000 mph) with no contrail or flashing lights. it was approx 10,000 ft high and larger than a plane at that same height. it moved behind clouds and didn't reappear. i saw it for only a few seconds based on the rapid speed. it was moving in a northeast direction.
